subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez was 1 for 4 in his first game since he broke his hand on July 24, but Tampa Bay broke a 3-3 tie in the eighth inning off reliever Dave Robertson.
snippet: Alex Rodriguez was 1 for 4 in his first game since he broke his hand on July 24, but Tampa Bay broke a 3-3 tie in the eighth inning off reliever Dave Robertson.
